quest.Name: ▶What's Eating the Watervine?
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You solved the mystery of the chewed-up watervine and warned the villagers of Joppa of the Girsh.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= walked below the chrome arches, beat back the throng of girshlings, and healed the wilting crops.
quest.Gospel: ▶At the bloody Battle of Red Rock, =name= fought the combined girshling and baboon forces to liberate the villagers of Joppa. In =player.t's= honor they =spice:history.gospels.Celebration.LateSultanate.!random=.

step.Name: ▶Travel to Red Rock
step.text: ▶Journey two parasangs north of Joppa to Red Rock.

step.Name: ▶Find the Vermin
step.text: ▶Find the creatures that are eating Joppa's watervine.

step.Name: ▶Get a Corpse
step.text: ▶Collect a corpse from one of the creatures.

step.Name: ▶Return with the Corpse
step.text: ▶Return to Joppa with the corpse of the watervine vermin.

quest.Name: ▶Raising Indrix
quest.Hagiograph: ▶O grace! =name= recovered a shard of black glass from a teeming jungle and returned it to the mechanical goat whose circuitry it powers.
quest.Gospel: ▶While wandering in the jungle near Kyakukya, =name= dreamed =player.subjective= orbited a darkling star and in its vast accretion disk piled the building blocks of self. From then on, =name= kept a starless, triangular prism on =player.possessive= person.

step.Name: ▶Find Mamon Souldrinker
step.text: ▶Travel to the goatfolk village and find Mamon Souldrinker.

step.Name: ▶Recover the Amaranthine Prism
step.text: ▶Return the amaranthine prism to Warden Indrix.

quest.Name: ▶Fetch Argyve a Knickknack
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You fetched a trinket for an old man.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Inside a temple of water and vine, =name= taught an old man the value of chrome.
quest.Gospel: ▶=spice:elements.entity@elements[random].weddingConditions.!random.capitalize=, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the Tinkers' Guild by marrying Argyve.

step.Name: ▶Find a Knickknack
step.text: ▶Search the regions surrounding Joppa for an artifact.

step.Name: ▶Return to Argyve
step.text: ▶Bring the artifact to Argyve.

quest.Name: ▶Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You fetched another trinket for an old man.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶In the shadow of steel beneath the High Salt Sun, =name= taught an old man the value of chrome.
quest.Gospel: ▶=spice:elements.entity@elements[random].weddingConditions.!random.capitalize=, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the Tinkers' Guild by marrying Argyve for a second time.

step.Name: ▶Find Another Knickknack
step.text: ▶Search the regions surrounding Joppa for another artifact.

step.Name: ▶Return to Argyve
step.text: ▶Return to Argyve with the artifact.

quest.Name: ▶Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!
quest.Accomplishment: ▶With your help, Argyve detected a strange signal.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶By the auspices of the marsh, =name= invented the Weirdwire Conduit and detected a hidden signal.
quest.Gospel: ▶At a remote workshop near the oasis-hamlet of Joppa, =name= and =player.possessive= apprentice Argyve invented an apparatus that evoked the presence of pounding drums and blistering wire. They named it the Weirdwire Conduit.

step.Name: ▶Find 200 Feet of Wire
step.text: ▶Search the rust wells, east of Joppa, for 200 feet of wire.

step.Name: ▶Return to Argyve
step.text: ▶Deliver the wire to Argyve.

quest.Name: ▶A Canticle for Barathrum
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You spoke with the Barathrumites at their enclave in Grit Gate.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶=name= penned and sang a canticle for the irenic quillbears who live beneath the earth.
quest.Gospel: ▶While roaming the westwise jungle, =name= came upon a clan of urshiib performing a secret ritual. Because of =player.t's= disk-like eyes, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: ▶Travel to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Travel to the ruined, subterranean gate northeast of Joppa.

step.Name: ▶Locate the Barathrumite Enclave
step.text: ▶Locate the Barathrumite enclave within Grit Gate

step.Name: ▶Speak with the Barathrumites
step.text: ▶Ask the Barathrumites about Argyve's strange signal.

quest.Name: ▶A Signal in the Noise
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You spoke with the Barathrumites at their enclave in Grit Gate.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶=name= penned and sang a canticle for the irenic quillbears who live beneath the earth.
quest.Gospel: ▶While roaming the westwise jungle, =name= came upon a clan of urshiib performing a secret ritual. Because of =player.t's= disk-like eyes, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: ▶Travel to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Travel to the ruined, subterranean gate in the western jungle.

step.Name: ▶Locate the Barathrumite Enclave
step.text: ▶Locate the Barathrumite enclave within Grit Gate

step.Name: ▶Speak with the Barathrumites
step.text: ▶Ask the Barathrumites about the strange signal.

quest.Name: ▶More Than a Willing Spirit
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You braved Golgotha and displayed your prowess to the Barathrumites.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= emerged from the trash chutes of Golgotha, victorious and bathed in slime.
quest.Gospel: ▶While roaming the westwise jungle, =name= came upon a clan of urshiib performing a secret ritual. Because of =player.t's= coating of foul slime, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: ▶Travel to Golgotha
step.text: ▶Travel to the great cave Golgotha north of Grit Gate.

step.Name: ▶Find a Dysfunctional Waydroid
step.text: ▶Find a dysfunctional waydroid among the ruins of Golgotha.

step.Name: ▶Repair the Waydroid
step.text: ▶Repair the waydroid.

step.Name: ▶Return to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Return to Grit Gate with the waydroid and speak with the Barathrumites.

quest.Name: ▶Decoding the Signal
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You spoke with the baetyl at the Temple of the Rock and decoded the mysterious signal.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Bravery! =name= plunged into the mouth of an open ice shelf and conversed with a baetyl in the sacred tongue.
quest.Gospel: ▶Inside a giant block of ice, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the Mechanimists by exchanging whispered vows with a sparking baetyl.

step.ID: Get Q Girl's Instructions onto the Data Disk
step.Name: ▶Get Q Girl's Instructions onto the Data Disk
step.text: ▶Speak to Q Girl in the workshop and ask her to encode her instructions for the baetyl onto the disk.

step.ID: Locate the Mechanimist Compound at Bethesda Susa
step.Name: ▶Locate the Mechanimist Compound at Bethesda Susa
step.text: ▶Travel north to the great cavern Bethesda Susa and locate the Mechanimist temple.

step.Name: ▶Decode the Signal
step.text: ▶Infiltrate the Mechanimist compound, engage the baetyl, and decode the signal.

step.Name: ▶Return to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Return to Grit Gate and speak with Otho.

quest.Name: ▶O Glorious Shekhinah!
quest.Accomplishment: ▶On the recommendation of a proselyte, you visited the merchant bazaar and grand cathedral at the Six Day Stilt.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶=name= trekked through the salt pans, north and west, to the merchant bazaar and grand cathedral of the Six Day Stilt. There, the stiltfolk sang hymns in the sultan's honor.
quest.Gospel: ▶After trekking the vacant flats, =name= journeyed to the merchant bazaar and cathedral at the Six Day Stilt. There =player.subjective= befriended the Mechanimists and threw an artifact down the Sacred Well.

step.ID: Make a Pilgrimage to the Six Day Stilt
step.Name: ▶Make a Pilgrimage to the Six Day Stilt
step.text: ▶Journey through the Great Salt Desert to visit the merchant bazaar and Mechanimist cathedral, where a proselyte asked you to make an offering of a trinket.

quest.Name: ▶The Earl of Omonporch
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You dealt with Asphodel and secured the grounds at the base of the Spindle.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= appointed Asphodel the Lovely earl of Omonporch and Protector of the Spindle Gjaus.
quest.Gospel: ▶In =year=, =name= appointed the corrupt administrator Asphodel as earl and minister of Omonporch. There xe mandated the practice of =spice:elements.entity@elements[random].practices.!random= in =player.t's= name.

step.Name: ▶Travel to Omonporch
step.text: ▶Travel north to the Spindle at Omonporch.

step.Name: ▶Secure the Spindle
step.text: ▶Take control of the grounds beneath the Spindle.

step.Name: ▶Return to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Return to Grit Gate to report your success.

step.Name: ▶Investigate the Rumbling
step.text: ▶Access the mainframe and scan the shale surrounding the enclave.

step.Name: ▶Speak to Otho
step.text: ▶Speak to Otho to via the mainframe room intercom or in person.

quest.Name: ▶A Call to Arms
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You valiantly defended Grit Gate from an attack by the Putus Templar.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶=name= smashed a battalion of Sons and Daughters through a giant mainframe, showering the surrounding temple in glass and gallium.
quest.Gospel: ▶In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= won a decisive victory against the combined Templar forces at the bloody Battle of Grit Gate. Grit Gate was so devasted by hot gallium and smashed glass that it was renamed Otho's Graveyard.

step.Name: ▶Prepare Defenses
step.text: ▶Power laser emplacements, power force projectors, overclock chromelings, and activate Rodanis Y in preparation for the Putus Templar attack.

step.Name: ▶Defend Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Defend Grit Gate from its assailants.

step.Name: ▶Speak to Otho
step.text: ▶Speak to Otho to assess the losses suffered in the attack.

quest.Name: ▶Pax Klanq, I Presume?
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You walked the Coral Path and convinced Pax Klanq, mushroom prodigy, to fabricate a battery of Q Girl's design.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶In the void of space, =name= the Mason constructed a Coral Path out of starbrick and conversed with a mushroom in the sacred tongue.
quest.Gospel: ▶In an extradimensional cathedral made of coral and fungus flesh, =name= cemented =player.possessive= relationship with fungi by marrying Pax Klanq.

step.ID: Get Q Girl's Blueprints for the Climber
step.Name: ▶Get Q Girl's Blueprints for the Climber
step.text: ▶Get the blueprints for the climber to deliver to Pax Klanq.

step.ID: Seek the Heart of the Rainbow
step.Name: ▶Seek the Heart of the Rainbow
step.text: ▶Decipher the first part of the enigma.

step.Name: ▶Eat the God's Flesh
step.text: ▶Decipher the second part of the enigma.

step.Name: ▶Follow the Coral Path
step.text: ▶Decipher the third part of the enigma.

step.ID: Convince Pax Klanq to Construct the Climber
step.Name: ▶Convince Pax Klanq to Construct the Climber
step.text: ▶Get Pax Klanq to agree to fabricate the climber from Q Girl's design.

step.Name: ▶Return to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Return to Grit Gate and speak to Barathrum.

quest.Name: ▶Petals on the Wind
quest.Accomplishment: ▶At the behest of a hindren pariah, you traveled to the hidden village of Bey Lah to investigate a mystery.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Benevolent =name= agreed to meddle in the affairs of the meadow at the behest of a deerfolk pariah. The sultan reigns with kindheartedness!
quest.Gospel: ▶At =spice:time.partsOfDay.!random= under a =spice:commonPhrases.strange.!random.article= and meadowed sky, the hindren of Bey Lah saw an image on the horizon that looked like a great looking glass. It was =name=, and once =player.subjective= arrived, the hindren built a monument to =player.objective= and thenceforth called =player.objective= the Looking Glass Kendren.

step.Name: ▶Investigate Bey Lah
step.text: ▶Travel to the hidden village of Bey Lah and investigate the problems there.

quest.Name: ▶Find Eskhind
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You found the hindren pariah Eskhind and her sisters inside a hollowed out tree.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Remember! =name= admonished the pariah Eskhind for fleeing her destiny. Thenceforth she was known as Eskhind the Meek.
quest.Gospel: ▶In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= was challenged by the accused Eskhind to a duel over the location of the hindren heirloom Kindrish. =name= won and admonished Eskhind into returning to Bey Lah.

step.Name: ▶Find Eskhind
step.text: ▶Find Eskhind and retrieve Kindrish.

step.Name: ▶Speak to Warden Neelahind
step.text: ▶Speak to Warden Neelahind, who was close friends with Eskhind.

step.Name: ▶Deliver News of Eskhind
step.text: ▶Speak to Keh with news of Eskhind.

quest.Name: ▶Love and Fear
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You found and returned a discarded love poem.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶How inspiring is the presence of =name=, who so redeemed Eskhind the Meek that she sought the hand of Bey Lah's greatest champion!
quest.Gospel: ▶In the burnt out core of a tree stump, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the hindren of Bey Lah by marrying Eskhind and the Warden Neelahind.

step.Name: ▶Rescue an Imperiled Love
step.text: ▶Intervene before the fate of the lovers is sealed.

step.Name: ▶Return the Love Sonnet
step.text: ▶Give the crumpled sheet of paper to its author or intended recipient.

quest.Name: ▶Kith and Kin
quest.Accomplishment: ▶For better or worse to the fate of Bey Lah, you solved the mystery of Kindrish's disappearance and helped Warden Neelahind administer justice.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Hallowed savior! =name= brought peace and prosperity to the troubled deerfolk of the Bey Lah meadow.
quest.Gospel: ▶Acting against thieves and the authorities who empower them, =name= led an investigation in the village of Bey Lah. Because of =player.t's= =spice:elements.entity@elements[random].adjectives.!random= wit, the Warden Neelahind was able to properly administer justice.

step.Name: ▶Brief Warden Neelahind
step.text: ▶Tell Bey Lah's Warden about the disputed nature of Kindrish's theft.

step.Name: ▶Discover all the evidence
step.text: ▶Discover all evidence that might lead to the thief.

step.Name: ▶Accuse the thief
step.text: ▶Speak to Warden Neelahind with evidence of the event and accuse the thief that took Kindrish.

quest.Name: ▶The Buried Watchers
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You visited a coterie of Tomb-dwelling mopango.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Deep in the Tomb of the Eaters at Omonporch, =name= stumbled upon a clan of mopango performing a secret ritual. Ey accepted the sultan into eir fold and taught =player.objective= eir secrets.
quest.Gospel: ▶Deep in the Tomb of the Eaters at Omonporch, =name= stumbled upon a clan of mopango performing a secret ritual. Ey accepted the =sultanTerm= into eir fold and taught =player.objective= eir secrets.

step.ID: Visit the Mopango Settlement in the Tomb of the Eaters
step.Name: ▶Visit the Mopango Settlement in the Tomb of the Eaters
step.text: ▶Find Vivira, a friendly turret in the Northwest catacombs, and tell em that Zothom sent you.

step.Name: ▶Talk to Lebah
step.text: ▶Ask Lebah about eir encounter with the repulsive device.

step.Name: ▶Recover the Repulsive Device
step.text: ▶Locate k-Goninon in the Folk Catacombs and recover the repulsive device.

step.Name: ▶Speak with the Watchers
step.text: ▶Ask the mopango watchers Dadogom, Doyoba, Gyamyo, and Yona about the repulsive device.

step.Name: ▶Use the Repulsive Device
step.text: ▶Choose how to best apply the repulsive device.

quest.Name: ▶Tomb of the Eaters
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You returned from the Tomb of the Eaters after successfully disabling the Spindle's magnetic field.

step.Name: ▶Recover the Mark of Death
step.text: ▶Recover the lost sigil used by the Eaters to mark their dead.

step.Name: ▶Inscribe the Mark
step.text: ▶Tattoo the mark on your body.

step.ID: Enter the Tomb of the Eaters
step.Name: ▶Enter the Tomb of the Eaters
step.text: ▶Gain entrance to the sealed Tomb.

step.ID: Ascend the Tomb and Cross into Brightsheol
step.Name: ▶Ascend the Tomb and Cross into Brightsheol
step.text: ▶Ascend the Tomb and find Resheph's burial chamber. From there, discover a way to travel to Brightsheol.

step.Name: ▶Disable the Spindle's Magnetic Field
step.text: ▶Access the Spindle's control unit and turn off the field.

step.Name: ▶Return to Grit Gate
step.text: ▶Return to Grit Gate and speak to Barathrum.

step.Name: ▶Consult Settlements
step.text: ▶Convince the leaders of at least three settlements to provide sanctuary for the slynth.

step.Name: ▶Sanctuary Candidates
step.text: ▶These factions have agreed to host the slynth.

step.Name: ▶Bid the Slynth to Choose
step.text: ▶Tell Thah to convene the slynth and make a decision.

step.Name: ▶Return to the Hydropon
step.text: ▶Once the slynth have arrived at their new home, speak to Thah at the hydropon.

quest.Name: ▶If, Then, Else
quest.Accomplishment: ▶You helped Chavvah, the Tree of Life, complete the ritual of -elseing and sever one of its entity-chimes forever.
quest.Hagiograph: ▶Beauty in subtraction! Pruner =name= cut the Tree of Life to a more aesthetic form.
quest.Gospel: ▶Acting in accordance with the Tree of Life's many wills, =name= brought a transit rock to the glowing Soft beneath Chavvah's trunk. There =player.subjective= performed a secret ritual and returned to the surface forever altered.

step.Name: ▶Gather Tau's Chime
step.text: ▶Retrieve Tau's chime from her branch in the keter.

step.ID: Go to the Bottom of Taproot
step.Name: ▶Go to the Bottom of Taproot
step.text: ▶Travel down Chavvah's taproot to its terminus, 40 strata deep.

step.Name: ▶Reunite Tau with Her Chime
step.text: ▶Touch her chime to Taproot and finish the ritual of -elseing.

step.Name: ▶Return to the Keter
step.text: ▶Return to the keter and speak with Dyvvrach.

step.Name: ▶Procure the Sanguine Fluid
step.text: ▶Bring 20 drams of primordial soup to Pax Klanq.

step.Name: ▶Choose a Body
step.text: ▶Provide a follower level 30 or higher.

step.Name: ▶Choose a Catalyst
step.text: ▶Provide 3 drams of a pure liquid.

step.Name: ▶Choose an Atzmus
step.text: ▶Provide the limb of a creature.

step.Name: ▶Choose an Armament
step.text: ▶Provide one zetachrome weapon.

step.Name: ▶Choose an Incantation
step.text: ▶Provide an entry from your chronology.

step.Name: ▶Choose a Hamsa
step.text: ▶Provide an item that weights 5 lbs. or less.

step.Name: ▶Acquire an Ascension Power Source
step.text: ▶Provide 3 drams of neutron flux or find another power source.

step.Name: ▶Prepare to Ascend
step.text: ▶Get Barathrum in the golem.

step.Name: ▶Ascend
step.text: ▶Engage the ascension mechanisms of the Spindle.

step.Name: ▶Defeat =name=
step.text: ▶Remove the threat of the Templar warleader from the perimeter of Omonporch.

step.Name: ▶Defeat =name=
step.text: ▶Remove the threat of the Templar warleader from the perimeter of Omonporch.

step.Name: ▶Defeat =name=
step.text: ▶Remove the threat of the Templar warleader from the perimeter of Omonporch.

step.Name: ▶Defeat =name=
step.text: ▶Remove the threat of the Templar warleader from the perimeter of Omonporch.

step.Name: ▶Beast Slouching
step.text: ▶Remove the threat of =name=.
